osal_sem.h
==========

**Overview**\ 
--------------

**Related Modules:**

`OSAL <osal.md>`__

**Description:**

Declares semaphore structures and interfaces.

**Since:**

1.0

**Version:**

1.0

**Summary**\ 
-------------
